creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: orange textile covered in abstract multicolored embroidery; on front of panel, the same star like shape is printed in each quadrant and is either purple and gold or black and white; bordering the panel is a mesh like woven fabric with multicolored tassels attached at ends; reverse side of panel consists of fabric with red, green, blue, orange, and white stripes; inner lining of mirror cover has ikat patterned fabric as well as red and white patterned fabric
title: Lakai mirror cover (ayna khalta)
